headline.main: NEW INVASION FEAR IN ITALY REPORTED; Pantelleria Garrisons Put on Alert for an Imminent Attack, Madrid Says FLEET IS BELIEVED READY Three-Pronged Allied Drive to Include Sardinia and Sicily Envisaged in Rome

lead_paragraph: MADRID, June 2 (U.P.) -- Reliable reports from the French Riviera said tonight that the Italian garrisons on Pantelleria had been ordered to action stations to meet an imminent Allied invasion attempt.
abstract: Pantelleria garrisons warned of imminent attack; Ital Fleet reptd ready
snippet: MADRID, June 2 (U.P.) -- Reliable reports from the French Riviera said tonight that the Italian garrisons on Pantelleria had been ordered to action stations to meet an imminent Allied invasion attempt....
